code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Coin_Tracker(){const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[coins,setCoins]=useState([]);const[val,setCoin]=useState("");const[usd,setUsd]=useState(0);const[changePrice,setChangePrice]=useState(0);const[changeCoin,setChangeCoin]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://api.coinpaprika.com/v1/tickers").then(res=>res.json()).then(json=>{setCoins(json);setLoading(false);});},[]);const findCoin=element=>{if(`${element.name} (${element.symbol})`===val){return true;}};const onChange=event=>{setCoin(event.target.value);};const usdChange=event=>{setUsd(event.target.value);};const usdSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();const myCoin=coins.find(findCoin);setChangeCoin(myCoin.symbol);const price=parseFloat(myCoin.quotes.USD.price).toFixed(3);setChangePrice(parseFloat(usd/price).toFixed(3));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"The Coins"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:val,onChange:onChange,children:coins.map(coin=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{children:[coin.name," (",coin.symbol,")"]},coin.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:usdSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:usdChange,value:usd,type:"integer",placeholder:"enter Your USD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["You can buy ",changePrice,changeCoin]})]})]});}export default Coin_Tracker;
